name: Lightbeam Super Deluxe
description:
Arrow keys to move [Z] is jump/interact [X] is sprint [Enter] is Start

Made for the Nintendo Gameboy, this game is is loaded with immersive worlds,

 remarkable characters and riveting storylines. 

The tale follows Lightbeam, a being with impeccable speed,

charisma and dashingly good looks.

Do you have what it takes?

Probably.

This game is unfinished and is currently being developed. 

It is currently scheduled for full release this spring.
